column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Fantastic atmosphere
column2: completely mediocre food. I had a walnut chocolate chunk cookie
column3: a vanilla macaron and a decaf espresso
column4: none of which were noteworthy in the slightest. I arrived late in the afternoon
column5: so they were out of all croissants. I would be willing to come back and try them
column6: as that would be the real test.
